Description.Name: AC/5 HVAP 81
Description.Details: Eloder Mak, Fresh from making their AV/5 HVAP autocannon, the 'Thorn Flinger,' created a new lighter massed Autocannon in Class 5 capacity.  This, however, is not a LAC/5 as is well known.   Eloder Mak lightened this gun by reducing the feed rate for the Autocannon.  This has two net effects.  First, the AC/5-LW, as it is abbreviated, fires half as many shells per unit of time.  Secondly, the shells, being bigger and slower, lose accuracy but gain hitting power.  Of course, altering the ammunition feeds does increase the chance of jamming the weapon out.  Unlike the LAC/5, the AC/5-LW maintains a similar range grouping to other standard AC/5 variants.  Almost Every AC/5-LW seen to date is noted for having Kali-Yama proof markings on the barrel.

BonusValueA: +2 Heat Damage, +3 Stab damage, -10 Damage, +2 Piercingt Damage
BonusValueB: Extended Range, 3% jam chance, 120% crit chance
